name: OpenSea Discord Bot
description: A TS script to hit the OpenSea API for collection sales and send messages to Discord

CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: The address of your token contract

COLLECTION_SLUG.description: The OpenSea slug for your collection

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: The auth token for a Discord bot

DISCORD_CHANNEL_ID.description: Your Discord channel ID (snowflake), i.e. 694927656805859499, where your Bot has access and will post

SECONDS.description: How many seconds should we look back for sales on OpenSea. i.e. 3600 for one hour. Running more frequently may get you banned from the OpenSea API
